node.title: American ex-priest in Timor-Leste guilty of sex abuse, sentenced to 12 years in prison
node.alt: A slim elderly man in light blue shirt and glasses walks towards the camera outside a building on a sunny day
node.description: In the first case of its kind in the staunchly Catholic nation, 84-year-old Richard Daschbach was sentenced on Tuesday, found guilty of sexually abusing orphaned and disadvantaged young girls under his care.
node.content:
["A defrocked American priest in Timor-Leste\u00a0has been sentenced to 12 years in prison after being found\u00a0guilty of\u00a0sexually abusing orphaned and disadvantaged young girls under his care.", "In the first case of its kind in the staunchly Catholic nation, 84-year-old\u00a0Richard Daschbach received his punishment in the district of Oecusse, 200km\u00a0west of the capital, Dili.", "Having spent decades as a missionary in the country's remote enclave of Oecusse, he faced charges of child sexual abuse, as well as child pornography and domestic violence.", "The trial began in February but was postponed several times before concluding last month.", "During the proceedings, victims complained about threats and online attacks.", "Daschbach maintains strong backing from some prominent figures, including former president Xanana Gusmao, who went to the court on Tuesday.", "", "
Richard Daschbach was expelled from his Catholic congregation in Timor Leste in 2018.(Flickr: Keith Miller)
", "Timor-Leste is considered the\u00a0most Catholic place outside of the Vatican, and Daschbach had been a key figure\u00a0in\u00a0the tiny South-East Asian nation's fight for independence.", "Once considered a local hero for founding children's shelters that\u00a0operated for more than two decades, Daschbach was\u00a0expelled from his Catholic congregation in 2019 after admitting to sexual abuse of minors.", "The previous year he was expelled from the Church de Santo Antonio de Motael in Dili.", "He was born in Pennsylvania and first came to East Timor in 1966 when it was a Portuguese colony.", "Daschbach founded the Topu Honis or Guide To Life children's homes in Oe-Kusi Ambeno, an East Timorese enclave in the Indonesian-controlled western half of Timor.", "In\u00a01992, he\u00a0was feted for saving children during East Timor's war for independence from Indonesia.", "", "
Former president Xanana Gusmao (right) celebrated\u00a0Daschbach's 84th birthday with the ex-priest in January.(Supplied)
", "Mr Daschbach's two shelters cared for orphans and children and youth from impoverished families, disabled people and women who have fled domestic violence.", "Some of the hundreds of children who lived in the shelters went on to study at universities in Australia, the US and Indonesia.", "Mr Gusmao, the\u00a0East Timorese independence hero, was criticised earlier this year for visiting Daschbach at his Dili home where he is under house arrest, toasting him on his 84th birthday in January with cake and drink.", "Wires/ABC"]
